column1: Scaly Oily Skin Problem Primarily On Face and Scalp
column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I'm a 42 year old female, dealing with breakouts, tiny bumps all over my forehead and temples and very oily skin.  I keep my skin clean and look younger than I really am so I'm very self-consious about my skin.  Totally fed up,I went back to my dermatologist and said " I've got to get rid of this acne/bumps". She prescribed Clarifoam and I can tell a big difference with the oil on my skin when I wake up, and during the day.  I can also tell the bumps on my forehead are slowly disappearing and there are no new breakouts- Yay !  I use clarifoam in the morning under my makeup, and at night before bed.  So far, so good !
